Name: Haunted Past: Realm of Ghosts
About the game: Death is not the end. There is beyond the veil, another realm between life and death, where spirits lurk, their business unfinished. Many years ago, Emily plummeted from an attic window to her doom. Her house now lies abandoned along with the mystery of her death. Sara has inherited this dark home, only to discover that it is not empty. Through Sarah, Emily has found a way to speak. But there are Others in shadow, restless... Features: • 130+ Haunting Scenes to Navigate. • Move between two worlds. • What you do in one affects the other. • Customizable Difficulty to set challenges how you like them. • Solve a 30 year old mystery
